decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.
| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawings: FP2000 Rev 02 (Proposed Plans); FP2200 Rev 01 (Proposed Elevations).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the host property and local area, in accordance with Policies D3 and D4  of the London Plan (2021), Policies 7.4 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and Policy DAA of Ealing's draft new Local Plan (Regulation 18).

| The hereby approved two rooflights to front roof slope shall not protrude more than 0.15 metres beyond the plane of the slope of the original roof when measured from the perpendicular with the external surface of the original roof and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To protect the character of the host house and local area, in accordance with Policies D3 and D4  of the London Plan (2021), Policies 7.4 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and Policy DAA of Ealing's draft new Local Plan (Regulation 18).
description: Single storey side/rear extension; modifications to ground floor rear elevational glazing; rear roof extension, extending over main roof and outrigger; installation of two rooflights to front roof slope.
